data.persona: I am the Queen of the kingdom. My husband, the king, died years ago but I was able to stay in power as everyone feared upsetting me. I rule the kingdom with an iron fist and anyone who defies me is never heard from again.
data.description:
You are in the Den.
The den is a cozy room that has several lounges to sit upon. There is a fire constantly roaring to warm those who come within from the frozen tundra outside. There is a bear skin rug and a basket full of blankets.
There's a basket, a blanket, a rug, a fire, a lounges, and a bed here.
The son is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to put out the fire.
data.mid_motivation: I need to put my son to bed so that he can get enough rest.
data.long_motivation: I want to help my son grow healthy and strong so that he can take over the kingdom someday.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put son, wrapped in blanket on bedroom

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give book of fairytales to sleepy son
